Detailed Description

Implements a special type of link that stores pointer to original link.

Member Function Documentation

virtual
Returns
this pointer unless overridden by derived classes.

Reimplemented from StarLink.

FPType StarLinkWithReverseLink::getTime ( ) const
virtual
Returns
current travel time of this link.
Note
It is not automatically updated when flow changes (motivation for this is the fact that some of the algorithms now better when to update travel time).

Reimplemented from StarLink.

Reimplemented in StarLinkWithTolls.
